select username name, sum(num1) `sum` ,CustomTown,avg(num1) mean, stddev_samp(num1) `std`, max(num1) `max`, min(num1) `min`, count(distinct device_id) `count` from ( select device_maintenance.username username,sum(num) num1,device_id,CustomTown from device_maintenance left join device on device.id= device_maintenance.device_id where device.CustomProject = '${customProject}' and device.project = '诱捕器管理'
and `date` >= '${startDate}'
and `date` <= '${endDate}'
group by device_id)as a group by CustomTown
